Name: Anime Arena: Infinite War
About the game: ANIME ARENA: INFINITE WAR is a unique action RPG game with survival elements. Zombies are everywhere and you are the only one who can defeat them! Take a cute anime girl under your control and fight against hordes of zombies. Earn money and gain experience to buy various upgrades and perks. MIGHTY BOSSES Defeat all super bosses to complete your goal. And be sure it won't be easy! ZOMBIES ZOMBIES ZOMBIES Fight your way through the 50 unique zombie enemies. They could be funny and silly but still are very deadly! CUSTOMIZATION AND EMOTES Dress up your girl as you like! Clothes, outfit, color and even bikini. Combinations are limitless! Also defeat small bosses to unlock various emotes. Let your anime girl be truly alive! PERKS AND UPGRADES Your power is infinite. Buy upgrades with money or perks with level ups and become the most powerful anime girl! ANIME STYLE Everybody loves cute anime girls! Take one under your control and let the others be your companions. INFINITE MODE Test your skills against an infinite waves of zombies in this special mode. How long could you survive? BLOODY ARENA Kill dozens of zombies with a single sword hit. Make these ragdoll dummies fly off with fountains of blood! HARDCORE ARENA Your every movement and action matters when enemies outnumber you. This arena won't spare you! DOUBLE SOUNDTRACK Two soundtracks in a single game! What would you choose, hard rock rhythms or relaxing ambient music? 500 LEVELS Survive on 500 levels and kill all super bosses to defeat this zombie threat once and for all!
